name: Video Game Auctions
tag_list: xbox-360, wii, playstation, ps3, nes, super-nintendo, ds, snes, sega-genesis, atari, computer, pc, microsoft-game-boy, action-figure, toy, statue, collectible, posters, video-game, merchandise, famicom, gamecube, limited-edition, n64, final-fantasy, resid
overview:
The site is about Video Game Auctions and it showcases rare and interesting video game collectibles from around the web such as games, merchandise and swag.

VideoGameAuctions.com, a site created by collectors for collectors. Here at VGA, we aim to showcase the rarest and more interesting video game collectibles around the web. Some collectibles might be on auction, others might be available in a store. Wherever it is we’ll make sure you know about it. We showcase everything from rare video games to rare merchandise such as the Nintendo World Championship Cart. Collectors want to know what else is out there that they don’t know about and this curiousity is always fulfilled at VideoGameAuctions.com.

Showcasing video game auctions is not the only thing we do at Video Game Auctions. There’s plenty of recommendations such as what gaming sites are out there that you don’t know about, or that Youtube channel you never came across on. We also do reviews for certain products and games so check out our articles section! Among other things, topics that are discussed include:

Game company’s such as: Nintendo PlayStation Microsoft Atari Sega

Consoles such as: Wii Ps3 Xbox 360 Atari 2600 Sega Genesis Different types of collectibles such as: Game Swag Promotional Items Merchandise Statues Action Figures

Relax, take it easy and come join us where we update VGA on a daily basis!
